dialogue.line: Your %%VTsister%% wants to talk to you, go to her first!

dialogue.option: >How should I fix the air system?<

dialogue.line: No, there is nothing to do at the moment, but you can look around if you find something to do.
You can go to your %%VTprivate capsule%% to rest. Remember, a well recovered worker is a good worker!
Find the air system console on the %%VTcrew deck%% and get it online.
Once you found the console, check out %%GRINFO on the upper right side%% to learn about the characteristics of the machine.
Then start the boot protocols and %%GRclick on the coins%%, which fit to the system.
You can learn more characteristics by practice or if you %%GRask the technician%%.
The oxygen level decreases due to a malfunction of the %%RDventilation system%%. Do something useful and fix it.
I will grant you %%GRaccess%% to the %%GRlife support%% system chamber on the crew deck. Don`t blew it up.
You fixed the air system! Here is you %%GRmoney%%!
The air system is %%RDstill down%% ... did you already check the %%VTair control console%% on the crew deck?
For me it looks like that some of the %%VTvents%% are blocked, you should check them too.
You can %%GRask Luca%% for help with the air hub, he is on the crewdeck.
Look at the %%VTscreen%%! The first freight capsule was hit on the port side.
The life-support systems there are failing.. ..we have to %%VTcheck whats going on%% there.
You'll need a %%VTspacesuit%%. Go to the %%VTengine room%% and look for the locker.
Go to the %%VTreactor in the machine room%% there you can restore the main power.
